@gchanan Thanks for fixing this. Could you add a regression test that runs on CI? E.g in #4321 I've added the following test that does not require Scipy

class TestDistributions(TestCase):
    ...
    def test_rsample_backward_smoke(self):
        for Dist, params in EXAMPLES:
            for i, param in enumerate(params):
                if Dist.has_rsample and all(isinstance(p, Variable) for p in param):
                    Dist(**param).rsample().sum().backward()
